title: are there such things as typefaces with numeral ligatures?
content:
I don't remember ever seeing or hearing of numeral ligatures. I played around and made a few to see how they would work. I'm sure they'd be better with non-lining figures.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015161812im_/http:/typophile.com/files/numeral_ligatures_3675.jpg)

-=®=-
author: russellm

comments.content:
This is good!

I have made one, that geotuscan creature I showed over on the Best Numberals thread, that thing has ligated numbers by way of a two level crossbar arrangement. Commercially available in about three months.

Yes you'd have loads more fun---design potential---with hanging figures. I tend to make uniheight lining structured fonts

j a m e s

<cite>I don’t remember ever seeing or hearing of numeral ligatures.</cite>  
What did Goudy say? “The old guys stole our best ideas” …  
The first one is from Palatino (that is, the TrueType version Apple ships with its software), the second one from [Everson Mono](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015161812/http:/www.evertype.com/emono/) – latter being a ‘true’ (as in ‘touching’) ligature:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015161812im_/http:/typophile.com/files/8_3951.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015161812im_/http:/typophile.com/files/3_4906.png)

These custom condensed numerals are for a friend's tarot deck project. I made the 20 ligature because the same enclosed space in the design must contain the numbers 0 through 21.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015161812im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lig20_6044.png)
That 20 ligature is gorgeous. See! This is the _perfect_ excuse to get your ligatures on!

Yeah buddaye! Russell, this is a fine idea and just what we need---an excuse to make more ligurinos. I'm getting my ligated numerals on right now. I love your ligated number forty-five. Agreeably sinewy, iIt gives me a perfect excuse to use another hyphenate :^)

j a m e s

Had to share this.  
The lovely [Basile](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015161812/http:/www.tipo.net.ar/basile/index.html) from Tipo has numeric ligatures/ligated numerals. PDF linked from the [current FontShop Newsletter](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015161812/http:/www.fontshop.com/blog/newsletters/april2011b/).
